lemma RECT_eq_REC_tproof: \<comment> \<open>Partial and total correct recursion are equal if we can provide a termination proof.\<close> fixes a :: 'a assumes M: "trimono body" assumes WF: "wf V" assumes I0: "pre a x" assumes IS: "\<And>f arb x. \<lbrakk>\<And>arb' x'. \<lbrakk>pre arb' x'; (x', x) \<in> V\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> f x' \<le> M arb' x'; pre arb x; REC\<^sub>T body = f\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> body f x \<le> M arb x" assumes NT: "M a x \<noteq> top" shows "RECT body x = REC body x \<and> RECT body x \<le> M a x"
